name: Night Shift (itch)
description:
Being a surveillance officer is hard. Your duty is to monitor security cameras and report emergencies. As it usually is, looking at the screens soon gets tedious because nothing really happens when you stare at them.

Thank god you have internet and other little things to idle away. But remember to check cameras sometimes, this is the job you're paid for after all.

The game was created during #LD42 under 72 hours.  The link on entry: LD Entry  Hope you guys find it funny, entertaining or annoying. All is good.

___________

Alexander Yakshin @camlang41

Andrew Yakshin @andrewyakshin
